summary: An email from an FBI Special Agent in the New York VCAC/Human Trafficking unit, dated April 26, 2019, alerting recipients that Jeffrey Epstein possesses three US passports and that a travel alert has been placed on him.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The email states that Jeffrey Epstein has three US passports and that a travel alert has been placed on him.

events.title: Travel Alert Placement
events.description: An FBI Special Agent emails colleagues to inform them that Jeffrey Epstein has three US passports and that a travel hit/alert has been put in place.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein possessed three separate US passports as of April 2019.
A travel alert or 'hit' was placed on Epstein by law enforcement to monitor or restrict his movements.
The communication originated from the FBI's New York VCAC/Human Trafficking unit, indicating the investigation's focus.
